sentences.sContent: Alfred was intensely ambitious, obsessed with the idea of becoming rich.
sentences.sCn: 艾尔弗雷德雄心勃勃，一心想着发财。

sentences.sContent: ...China has also launched an ambitious space exploration program which includes a space station in 2020...
...Considering that the government's standards are not nearly ambitious enough...
...If he has ambitious goals and is willing to put in long hours...
...Attracting the brightest and most ambitious postgraduate and research students is critical if the UK is to maintain its quality reputation for research...
...Their parents are ambitious and the children are part of the parents' ambitions...

synos.tran: 野心勃勃的；有雄心的；热望的；炫耀的

words.tran: 雄心勃勃地；劲头十足地；热切地

trans.tranOther: determined to be successful, rich, powerful etc
